full_summary:
### Tender Announcement
#### Repair and/or Overhaul and/or Advanced Exchange of Brake Assemblies

**Tender Number:** PW-22-01009890
**Solicitation Number:** T8493-22-0038
**Publication Date:** 2022-10-12
**Closing Date:** 2022-11-04T14:00:00 (ENDED)

**Intended Use:** The Government of Canada requires the services of an experienced contractor to provide component repair and/or overhaul services and/or advanced exchange for unserviceable brake assemblies, removed from a CL600-2B16 (Challenger 604) aircraft.

**Quantity:** Estimated 1 to 6 units per year

**Contract Duration:** Contract ends March 31st, 2024, with the possibility of two one-year extensions.


**A Brief History of the Solicitation**
The contractor has solicited this service requirement twice previously, but has not received any bids that conform to the requirements. Therefore, the government has decided to proceed with a limited tendering process, as outlined in the Trade Agreements.


**Entity Requiring This Service:** Air Services Directorate of Transport Canada.


**Description of the Service Requirement**
The successful bidder will provide component repair and/or overhaul services and/or advanced exchange for unserviceable brake assemblies, component, specifically part 604-85123-101 [VPN 5012333], that meet the requirements outlined in Vendor Bulletin VB5012333-32-02 INTRODUCTION OF NEW HEAT STACK WITH TUNGSTEN-CARBIDE COATED ROTOR CHANNELS.


**How to Respond to This Tender**
Those interested in submitting a bid on this opportunity should address their submissions to the following contact:
Tanya Nadeau
tanya.nadeau@tc.gc.ca
343-575-6684


[Attachments to this Tender Announcement]
* Amendment 2 (PDF)
* Amendment 1 (PDF)
* RFP (PDF) [Note: Attachments have been shortened to only the most relevant parts.]



This entry clarifies the service requirement and seeks qualifying responses to the RFP.  Please assess suitability to respond prior to contract submission and participation until your bid has been accepted. Thank you for considering this opportunity.
